Andrew Phillips - Long-standing Open-Source Developer

ABSTRACT
Pretty much every development team is looking for ways to deliver code faster and better. Getting the basics of a Continuous Delivery pipeline in place is pretty easy, and in a cloud-native, microservice environment, testing and [...]
